Sounds good to me.

The only remaining bug that I want to be sure we handle=
d in 4.12 is
https://github.com/junit-team/junit/issues/126.  I'll also try=
 to take a
last pass through the current pull requests to see if any are ha=
nging and
should just be merged.  If you don't hear back from me over the n=
ext couple
of days, feel free to ping this thread.

After that, we'll need =
a couple of next steps: someone who will update the
pom.xml to mark a 4.12-=
beta-1, and one or more someones to clean up the
release notes at
https://g=
ithub.com/junit-team/junit/wiki/4.12-release-notesinto
something better-org=
anized.

   David

> wrote:

e
